snippet: The Film Society of Lincoln Center named Kent Jones and Robert Koehler to replace Richard Peña, who is stepping down after 25 years as the group's programming director and chairman of the New York Film Festival selection committee.
abstract: The Film Society of Lincoln Center named Kent Jones and Robert Koehler to replace Richard Peña, who is stepping down after 25 years as the group's programming director and chairman of the New York Film Festival selection committee.

headline.main: At Film Society, Two Programmers Will Take Over From Festival Veteran
headline.print_headline: A New Double Bill For the Film Society
